channel.title: Earth System Evolution
channel.description: Recent content on Earth System Evolution

item.description: David Diego is a Researcher at the Department of Earth science at the University of Bergen. His research interests include theoretical physics, dynamical systems, and mathematical modelling of biological processes. In this project he has worked on the computation of transfer entropy from time series using transfer operator approximation, making sure that our methods rest on solid mathematical foundations.

item.title: A new method for quantifying Earth system interactions from time series
item.description: A presentation of transfer entropy computation using the Perron-Frobenius operator.
